name: Cavalier Geneve - Inner Circle - Petit Robusto
additionalNotes: The Cavalier Geneve Black Series II was released at the 2017 IPCPR trade show. This marked the third line for the company. The Black Series II is different from the original Black Series in that it is box-pressed. Every cigar made by Cavalier Genève has a unique gold foil atop the wrapper leaf towards the head. It is the company’s signature style and makes them very recognizable. Cavalier Geneve is owned by Swiss entrepreneur, Sebastien Decoppet.
